name: Trouble Past
description:
You have woken up in a house that can't seem to remember, how you got here?
You will be going through the forest and trying to uncover the mystery of your troubled past.

This is a work in progress and will need to be worked on more then it is currently is.

W - moving to different area

A - moving left

D - moving right

Z - interact 

X - flashlight (when you find it)

Made in GB Studio.

Sauce (credit for some sources I used)

https://edermunizz.itch.io/1-bit-pixel-art-forest

Gb Studio music
